TableView.name: QUANTITIES_SOLD
TableView.userDefinedSQL:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW QUANTITIES_SOLD
AS
SELECT "SH"."COUNTRIES"."COUNTRY_NAME", "SH"."PRODUCTS"."PROD_NAME", "SH"."TIMES"."CALENDAR_YEAR", "SH"."CUSTOMERS"."CUST_LAST_NAME", "SH"."SALES"."QUANTITY_SOLD" FROM "SH"."COUNTRIES", "SH"."PRODUCTS", "SH"."TIMES", "SH"."CUSTOMERS", "SH"."SALES" WHERE ( "SH"."CUSTOMERS"."COUNTRY_ID" = "SH"."COUNTRIES"."COUNTRY_ID" ) AND ( "SH"."SALES"."CUST_ID" = "SH"."CUSTOMERS"."CUST_ID" ) AND ( "SH"."SALES"."PROD_ID" = "SH"."PRODUCTS"."PROD_ID" ) AND ( "SH"."SALES"."TIME_ID" = "SH"."TIMES"."TIME_ID" )
